医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
发现癌症中的性别特异性遗传改变中国北京大学血管稳态与重塑国家重点实验室崔春梅领导的最新研究为性别与癌症之间微妙的相互作用提供了新的视角，揭示了不同性别之间拷贝数改变（CNA）的显着性别特异性差异。癌症类型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Uncovering-gender-specific-genic-alterations-in-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Uncovering-gender-specific-genic-alterations-in-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9bf0b32-f34d-4a60-8147-f92b3f615ad4 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 11:04:00 -0400 Uncovering gender-specific genetic alterations in cancer
通过一锅等温滚环扩增快速检测 miRNA这项研究由阮珏教授（中国农业科学院，中国深圳）领导。作者开发了一种基于滚环扩增 (RCA) 的一锅等温检测方法，用于快速、特异性检测 miRNA 和短 RNA 片段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Rapid-miRNA-detection-with-one-pot-isotropic-rolling-circle-amplification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Rapid-miRNA-detection-with-one-pot-isotropic-rolling-circle-amplification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6b5a5ac-4694-47df-a208-bb25da1065ab Fri, 29 Mar 2024 10:52:00 -0400 Rapid miRNA detection with one-pot isothermal rolling circle amplification
复方制剂被证明可有效减少心血管疾病和死亡率圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院研究人员的一项新研究证实了之前的发现，即复方药有助于预防心脏病和中风，并减少患有高血压和高胆固醇等心血管危险因素的人的死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Polypills-prove- effective-in-reducing-cardioangio-disease-and-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Polypills-prove- effective-in-reducing-cardioangiography-disease-and-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64c314e5-10c0-4586-bbe4-b4bee72ca81d Fri, 29 Mar 2024 10:39:00 -0400 Polypills prove effective in reducing cardiovascular disease and mortality
传统花草茶中的新型脂质可带来潜在的健康益处一些花草茶中的脂质首次被详细鉴定，为研究它们对茶的健康益处的贡献奠定了基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Novel-lipids-in-traditional-herbal-teas-unlock-pottial-health-gains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Novel-lipids-in-traditional-herbal-teas-unlock-pottial-health-gains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f65bf62-cad4-4e84-a41c-436327297aa7 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 10:31:00 -0400 Novel lipids in traditional herbal teas unlock potential health gains
研究表明，三分之一的中度至重度 TBI 患者健康素养较低根据《头部创伤康复杂志》(JHTR) 发表的研究，对于相当一部分中度至重度创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 患者来说，健康素养较低是一个问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Research-highlights-low-health-literacy-among-one-third-of-people-with-moderate-to-severe-TBI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Research-highlights-low-health-literacy-among-one-third-of-people-with-moderate-to-severe-TBI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65282e99-a884-421f-873a-b17f7fdc2247 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 10:23:00 -0400 Research highlights low health literacy among one-third of people with moderate to severe TBI
第二代黑色素瘤疫苗可延长皮肤癌患者的生存期新研究显示，与第一代疫苗相比，UVA 癌症中心正在开发的第二代黑色素瘤疫苗可提高黑色素瘤患者的长期生存率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Second- Generation-melanoma-vaccine-prolongs-survival-of-病人-with-skin-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Second- Generation-melanoma-vaccine-prolongs-survival-of-病人-with-skin-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7c19070-b0c5-4c7e-aee1-6e890aeefa71 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 10:15:00 -0400 Second-generation melanoma vaccine prolongs survival of patients with skin cancer
CoViNet 简介：世卫组织冠状病毒专业知识全球网络世卫组织启动了一个新的冠状病毒网络 CoViNet，以促进和协调全球专业知识和能力，以尽早准确地检测、监测和评估 SARS-CoV-2、MERS-CoV 和对公共卫生具有重要意义的新型冠状病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Introducing-CoViNet-WHOs-global-network-for-coronavirus-expertise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Introducing-CoViNet-WHOs-global-network-for-coronavirus-expertise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90498ff5-a0f8-4232-b856-fccc22e9cde5 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 10:07:00 -0400 Introducing CoViNet: WHO's global network for coronavirus expertise
世卫组织发布结核病筛查和预防性治疗投资案例在 3 月 24 日世界结核病日到来之前，世卫组织发布了结核病筛查和预防性治疗的投资案例。与巴西、格鲁吉亚、肯尼亚和南非这四个国家的政府共同开展的一项模型研究强调了扩大结核病筛查和预防性治疗所带来的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/WHO-releases-an-investment-case-for-TB-screening-and-preventive-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/WHO-releases-an-investment-case-for-TB-screening-and-preventive-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afd8cd1e-d177-4306-9fb5-153f2364f588 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 09:57:00 -0400 WHO releases an investment case for TB screening and preventive treatment
解决针对老年妇女和残疾妇女的暴力行为的隐性危机根据世界卫生组织 (WHO) 今天发布的两份新出版物，老年妇女和残疾妇女面临着特殊的虐待风险，但她们的处境在很大程度上隐藏在大多数全球和国家暴力相关数据中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Addressing-the-hidden-crisis-of-violence-against-older-women-and-women-with-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Addressing-the-hidden-crisis-of-violence-against-older-women-and-women-with-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dc57f77-0db3-46c3-b021-ed4cbcb287f9 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 09:49:00 -0400 Addressing the hidden crisis of violence against older women and women with disabilities
研究强调饮用水中 2,6-DHNP 造成的健康风险2,6-DHNP 是一组消毒副产物 (DBP)，为公共卫生敲响了警钟。水世界中的这些有害物质比许多其他污染物更顽强、毒性更大，因此传统的水清洁方法很难去除它们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Research-highlights-health-risks-pose-by-26-DHNPs-in-drinking-water.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Research-highlights-health-risks-pose-by-26-DHNPs-in-drinking-water.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d143a90-8544-4c69-8b11-e0bd2c1396e3 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 09:42:02 -0400 Research highlights health risks posed by 2,6-DHNPs in drinking water
